item.title: Wrapping the screen
item.description: In some games, when the player or certain objects move off one edge of the screen, they re-emerge on the opposite edge. This can be achieved using the following block of code, placed inside the Update() method of an object’s script. The margin property can be tuned according to preference. The object must go past the edge of the margin, not just the screen, to be teleported to the other edge.
